name: Army City Strike Force - Sniper Combat Warfare Edition
name_original: Army City Strike Force - Sniper Combat Warfare Edition
description:
Get ready for an ultra realistic sniper game where you play a member of an elite sniper team on a mission to infiltrate a terrorist camp and take out all the bad guys.

One by one you shoot your way through until you come out victorious!

FEATURES

- Awesome graphics.
- Intense sniper action!
- Wicked soundtrack!
